titles.title: I Want To Live, In Union With My Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I want to live in union with my God.
I want to know His presence in my life.
I want to have His life lived out in mine.
I want to live in union with my God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I want to live in submission to my Lord.
I want to know the cutting of His sword.
I want to walk with Him to Calvary.
I want to live in submission to my Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Quiero vivir unido a mi Señor
Quiero sentir su presencia en mi ser
Su misma vida yo quiero tener
Quiero vivir unido a mi Señor.
Quiero vivir sumiso a mi Señor
Quiero sentir cortar su espada en mí
Quiero andar con El hasta la cruz
Quiero vivir sumiso a mi Señor.
